fi.cebylfwk.state
Class State

java.lang.Object
  fi.cebylfwk.state.State
All Implemented Interfaces:
Renderable, Updateable
public abstract class State
extends java.lang.Object
implements Renderable, Updateable

Base class for every game state in the game. State implementation classes should extend this.

          Has state been finished?

Method Detail

initialize

public abstract void initialize(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> parameters)
State initialization should happen here. For example you can load resources or set OpenGL commands here. This is called first in StateHandler when state changes to this state.

Parameters:
parameters - this should be populated by previous state so states can pass parameters from previous to next.
See Also:
StateHandler

Renders the given renderab object.

Specified by:

Parameters:
r - Renderer which will have all the rendering commands.
time - Frame delta time in nanoseconds. This be used when updating the logic, so it runs same speed on every machine.
